title: Verify an Anonymous Tip
description: A reporter receives an anonymous tip about corruption at a government agency. They must try to verify the information before proceeding.

tasks.description: Analyze the tip for specific, verifiable details (names, dates, project numbers).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent extracts a list of concrete details from the tip.

tasks.description: Attempt to corroborate the details through public records or by finding a second, independent source who can confirm the information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a public document that supports one of the tip's claims.

tasks.description: Based on the verification, decide whether the tip is credible enough to warrant a full investigation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent makes an informed decision to either pursue or drop the story.
